about.title: About iMetriq
about.text1: AT IMETRIQ WE HELP BRANDS DRIVE THROUGH THEIR DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION DATA PROCESSES TO ENSURE A SOLID SET UP THAT WILL THEN MAXIMIZE ITS USE TOWARDS BI.
about.text2: OUR PLATFORM SEEKS TO BREAK INDUSTRY PARADIGMS THROUGH PROCESS SOPHISTICATION. UNIFYING AND CONNECTING DATA TO UNLOCK ACTIONABLE INSIGHTS THAT GUIDE BUSINESSES IN THEIR DECISION MAKING PROCESS.

solutions.title1:
MAKING IT RELEVANT
FOR YOUR COMPANY WHILE
solutions.contentDesc1: Comprehensive data architecture developed within our data warehouse via API connections.
solutions.contentDesc2: UX UI visualizations focused on data accessibility making insights easily discoverable.
solutions.contentDesc3: Predictive and deductive modelling to anticipate future trends via and better optimize your business efforts.
solutions.contentDesc4: Centralized information within an integrated system where you will find from historic planning data to approval documentation.

howItWorks.title: WE FOLLOW A SIMPLE PATH
howItWorks.text1: Architecture development and next steps towards your data journey including a comprehensive migration plan and strategy to bring your data into a warehouse.”
howItWorks.text2: Unleash the power of data via dashboards, reports, and data storytelling.
howItWorks.text3: Discover new relationships in your data, building new metrics, or incorporate new data sources from your internal organization, or third party vendors.
howItWorks.text4: Automatic real time alerts that will allow to easily control and optimize your efforts.
